alert.note: Alert for Hopkins (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 8:31AM CDT until June 16 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Texas, including the following counties, Delta and Hopkins. * WHEN...Until 1130 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms tracking over the same locations. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area as rain totals from last night and this morning reach 2 to 4 inches. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sulphur Springs, Cooper, Cooper Lake State Park, Lake Sulphur Springs, Cooper Lake, Big Creek Lake, Sulphur Bluff, Klondike, Saltillo, Pine Forest, Tira, Pecan Gap, Birthright, New Birthright, Dike, Nelta, Charleston, Peerless, Flora and Pacio.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
